snippet.title: Clive 'N' Wrench - Update Trailer - Feb 2020
snippet.description:
It's starting to feel like 2020 will be a big year for Clive 'N' Wrench! So now feels like the perfect time for an update trailer,  showcasing a good chunk of the game's the progress over the last few months!

Keep up to date: www.CliveNWrench.com
Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/CliveNWrench
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/rurDFWv
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CliveGame
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClassicGJ
